casebody.data:
Fisher, Appellant, v. Golden Rule Insurance Company, Appellee. (Nos. 89-1323 and 89-1324 Submitted September 26, 1990 Decided June 12, 1991 Corrected October 16, 1991.) *75Sweeney, Acting C.J., O’Neill, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Joseph O’Neill, J., of the Seventh Appellate District, sitting for Moyer, C.J.

[Cite as Fisher v. Golden Rule Ins. Co. (1991), 62 Ohio St.3d 74.]
